summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details transportation charges, discounts, and shipment summaries, including specific shipments sent to various recipients. The invoice highlights Epstein's shipping activities and associated costs during December 2003.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the primary individual associated with the invoice, indicating he is the sender of multiple shipments.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as a sender in one of the shipments listed in the invoice.

persons.name: Malcolm Thompson
persons.context: Malcolm Thompson is listed as the recipient of a shipment sent to the Park Hyatt in Tokyo.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is mentioned as the recipient of shipments sent to the Financial Trust Company.

connections.description: Both Epstein and Maxwell are listed as senders for shipments in the invoice.
Epstein is the sender of a shipment addressed to Thompson.
Epstein is the sender of shipments addressed to Brennan.

events.title: Shipment Pickup
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx from Epstein's address.

events.title: Shipment Delivery
events.description: A shipment sent by Epstein was delivered to Malcolm Thompson in Tokyo.

events.title: Shipment Delivery
events.description: Another shipment sent by Epstein was delivered to Jeanne Brennan.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022
Park Hyatt Tokyo, 3712 Nishi Shinjuku, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo 16310-55, JP
6100 Red Hook Quarter, Suite S-3, St. Thomas 00602, VI
keyFacts: The invoice is dated December 29, 2003, and details shipping charges totaling USD 168.30.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the primary sender listed on the invoice, with multiple shipments sent to various recipients.
Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as a co-sender for one of the shipments.
Malcolm Thompson and Jeanne Brennan are identified as recipients of shipments sent by Epstein.
The invoice indicates a due payment date of January 13, 2004.
